Method.Name: GGen_Data_2D
Method.Description: Creates new GGen_Data_2D object of given size.

Method.Name: Clone
Method.Description: Creates a 1:1 copy of the current object.

Method.Name: GetWidth
Method.Description: Returns width of the map.

Method.Name: GetHeight
Method.Description: Returns height of the map.

Method.Name: GetLength
Method.Description: Returns length of the map.

Method.Name: SetValue
Method.Description: Sets value in one tile.

Method.Name: SetValueInRect
Method.Description: Sets value in all tiles inside a rectangle (bounds are included).

Param.Name: x1
Param.Description: X coordinate of the left border

Param.Name: y1
Param.Description: Y coordinate of the top borer.

Param.Name: x2
Param.Description: X coordinate of the right border.

Param.Name: y2
Param.Description: Y coordinate of the bottom border.

Method.Name: GetValue
Method.Description: Returns one value from the array.

Method.Name: GetValueInterpolated
Method.Description: Return one value from the array interpolated to a different map size.

Param.Name: x
Param.Description: X coordinate of the tile (in the interpolated map).

Param.Name: y
Param.Description: Y coordinate of the tile (in the interpolated map).

Method.Name: Add
Method.Description: Adds an integer to all values in the map.

Param.Name: value
Param.Description: Value to be added to values in the map.

Method.Name: AddMap
Method.Description: Adds another map to the current map.

Param.Name: addend
Param.Description: Map to be added. This map will be scaled to match the original map.

Method.Name: AddTo
Method.Description: Adds another map to the current map. Its coordinates will be shifted by an offset.

Param.Name: addend
Param.Description: Map to be added. This map will NOT be scaled to match the original map.

Param.Name: offset_x
Param.Description: Coordinates of the addend will be shifted by this value along the X axis.

Param.Name: offset_y
Param.Description: Coordinates of the addend will be shifted by this value along the Y axis.

Method.Name: AddMapMasked
Method.Description: Adds another map to the current map. The percentage of each value from the addend will depend on corresponding value from the mask.

Param.Name: addend
Param.Description: Map to be added. This map will be scaled to match the original map.

Param.Name: mask
Param.Description: Map used to mask the added value.

Method.Name: AddMasked
Method.Description: Adds a percentage of an integer to all values in the map. The percentage added will depend on corresponding value from the mask.

Param.Name: value
Param.Description: Value to be added to values in the map.

Param.Name: mask
Param.Description: Map used to mask the added value. This map will be scaled to match the current map.

Method.Name: Multiply
Method.Description: Multiplies each value in the map by a real number.

Param.Name: factor
Param.Description: Real number to multiply all values in the map.

Method.Name: MultiplyMap
Method.Description: Multiplies each value in the map by a corresponding value from factor.

Param.Name: factor
Param.Description: Array to be multiplied by. This map will be scaled to match the original map.

Method.Name: Invert
Method.Description: Flips sign of all values in the map.

Method.Name: Scale
Method.Description: Scales size of the map by a real number.

Param.Name: scale_values
Param.Description: Multiply the values by the ratio as well?

Method.Name: ScaleTo
Method.Description: Scales size of the map to new size.

Param.Name: scale_values
Param.Description: Scale the values correspondingly as well?

Method.Name: ScaleValuesTo
Method.Description: Scales values in the map to fit a new value range.

Method.Name: ResizeCanvas
Method.Description: Crops or expands the array without changing its values.

Param.Name: new_zero_x
Param.Description: X coordinate of new origin relative to the original zero.

Param.Name: new_zero_y
Param.Description: Y coordinate of new origin relative to the original zero.

Method.Name: Fill
Method.Description: Sets all values in the map.

Method.Name: FillMasked
Method.Description: Sets all values in the map. The percentage of value changed in each tile will depend on corresponding values in the mask.

Param.Name: mask
Param.Description: Map used to mask the filled value. This map will be scaled to match the current map.

Method.Name: Clamp
Method.Description: Clamps all values to range. All values outside the given range will be set either to min or max, whichever is closer.

Method.Name: CropValues
Method.Description: Clamps all values to range. All values outside the given range will be set either to 0.

Method.Name: Min
Method.Description: Returns the minimum of all values in the map.

Method.Name: Max
Method.Description: Returns the maximum of all values in the map.

Method.Name: Intersection
Method.Description: Performs a set intersection of the map graphs (higher of two respective values is applied).

Param.Name: victim
Param.Description: The intersection map. This map will be scaled to match the original map.

Method.Name: IntersectionTo
Method.Description: Performs a set intersection of the map graphs (higher of two respective values is applied). The intersection map coordinates will be shifted by an offset.

Param.Name: victim
Param.Description: The intersection map. This map will NOT be scaled to match the original map.

Param.Name: offset_x
Param.Description: Coordinates of the intersection map will be shifted by this value along the X axis.

Param.Name: offset_y
Param.Description: Coordinates of the intersection map will be shifted by this value along the Y axis.

Method.Name: Union
Method.Description: Performs a set union of the map graphs (higher of two respective values is applied).

Param.Name: victim
Param.Description: The union map. This map will be scaled to match the original map.

Method.Name: UnionTo
Method.Description: Performs a set union of the map graphs (higher of two respective values is applied). The union map coordinates will be shifted by an offset.

Param.Name: victim
Param.Description: The union map. This map will NOT be scaled to match the original map.

Param.Name: offset_x
Param.Description: Coordinates of the intersection map will be shifted by this value along the X axis.

Param.Name: offset_y
Param.Description: Coordinates of the intersection map will be shifted by this value along the Y axis.

Method.Name: Combine
Method.Description: Combines the current map with another map according to corresponding values in mask.

Param.Name: victim
Param.Description: The intersection map. This map will NOT be scaled to match the original map.

Param.Name: mask
Param.Description: The second map. This map will be scaled to match the original map.

Param.Name: relative
Param.Description: The mask used to determine value percentage from each map used. This map will NOT be scaled to match the original map.

Method.Name: ReplaceValue
Method.Description: Replaces all occurrences of a value with a different value.

Method.Name: Abs
Method.Description: Replaces each value with its absolute value (removes all negative signs).

Method.Name: Shift
Method.Description: Shifts all values in the array towards a direction by a corresponding value from profile.

Param.Name: direction
Param.Description: Direction towards which will the shiting be done.

Method.Name: Project
Method.Description: Extrudes one-dimensional profile towards a direction.

Method.Name: GetProfile
Method.Description: Extracts a one-dimensional slice from the map.

Param.Name: direction
Param.Description: Determines if a row (GGEN_HORIZONTAL) or column will be extracted.

Method.Name: Gradient
Method.Description: Creates a smooth gradient between two coords. The values will make transition between two values.

Param.Name: fill_outside
Param.Description: Should the values outside gradient area be filled as well?

Method.Name: GradientFromProfile
Method.Description: Creates a smooth gradient between two coords. The values will be picked from the gradient profile according to the point's position on the gradient.

Param.Name: fill_outside
Param.Description: Should the values outside gradient area be filled as well?

Method.Name: RadialGradient
Method.Description: Creates a radial gradient. The values will make a smooth transition between the center and the outer rim.

Param.Name: center_x
Param.Description: X coordinate of the gradient center.

Param.Name: center_y
Param.Description: Y coordinate of the gradient center.

Param.Name: fill_outside
Param.Description: Should the values outside gradient area be filled as well?

Method.Name: RadialGradientFromProfile
Method.Description: Creates a radial gradient. The values will be picked from the gradient profile according to the point's position on the gradient.

Param.Name: center_x
Param.Description: X coordinate of the gradient center.

Param.Name: center_y
Param.Description: Y coordinate of the gradient center.

Param.Name: fill_outside
Param.Description: Should the values outside gradient area be filled as well?

Method.Name: Noise
Method.Description: Fills the array with random perlin noise (http://freespace.virgin.net/hugo.elias/models/m_perlin.htm).

Param.Name: min_feature_size
Param.Description: Minimum wave length for amplitude to be used.

Param.Name: max_feature_size
Param.Description: Maximum wave length for amplitude to be used.

Method.Name: VoronoiNoise
Method.Description: Fills the array with random voronoi noise.

Param.Name: cell_size
Param.Description: Size of one cell (cells are considered to be squares).

Param.Name: points_per_cell
Param.Description: Number of points randomly placed in each cell.

Method.Name: SmoothDirection
Method.Description: Blurs the map in one direction. Uses linear smoothing algorithm.

Param.Name: direction
Param.Description: Direction in which is the smoothing done.

Method.Name: Smooth
Method.Description: Blurs the map. Uses linear smoothing algorithm.

Method.Name: Flood
Method.Description: Changes the values so only given percentage of values is higher than 0.

Param.Name: land_amount
Param.Description: The percentage of values to be higher than 0. 0 means no "land", 1.0 means no "water".

Method.Name: Pattern
Method.Description: Fills the current map with repeating pattern.

Method.Name: Monochrome
Method.Description: Replaces each value with 0 if it is less than equal than the threshold or 1 otherwise.

Param.Name: threshold
Param.Description: Values above threshold will be 1, otherwise 0.

Method.Name: SelectValue
Method.Description: Replaces all occurrences of a value with 1, all other values will be replaced with 0.

Method.Name: SlopeMap
Method.Description: Replaces values in the array with information about steepness of slope (change in value) in that particular value.

Method.Name: Scatter
Method.Description: Replaces each value with 1 with a probability defined by its value, all other values will be replaced with 1.

Method.Name: TransformValues
Method.Description: Replaces each value with a corresponding value from profile. Coordinate of the corresponding value is determined by the original value - the higher the value, the higher the coordinate in profile is.

Method.Name: Normalize
Method.Description: Makes sure that there are no slopes steeper than 45� in the map. Steeper slopes will be dealt with according to mode.

Method.Name: NormalizeDirection
Method.Description: Makes sure that there are no slopes steeper than 45� in either horizontal or vertical direction. Steeper slopes will be dealt with according to mode.

Method.Name: Transform
Method.Description: Applies a linear transformation matrix onto the map.

Param.Name: preserve_size
Param.Description: matrix must be invertible (a11 * a22 - a12 * a21 != 0).

Method.Name: Rotate
Method.Description: Rotates the map by an angle counter-clockwise.

Param.Name: preserve_size
Param.Description: If set to true, the result will be cropped to match its original boundaries.

Method.Name: Shear
Method.Description: Shears the map vertically and/or horizontally.

Param.Name: horizontal_shear
Param.Description: Horizontal shear factor (0 means no horizontal shearing).

Param.Name: vertical_shear
Param.Description: Horizontal shear factor (1 means no horizontal shearing).

Param.Name: preserve_size
Param.Description: If set to true, the result will be cropped to match its original boundaries.

Method.Name: Flip
Method.Description: Flips the map along one coordinate axis.

Param.Name: direction
Param.Description: The axis, along which the map will be flipped.

Method.Name: ReturnAs
Method.Description: Calls the API return handler.

Method.Name: FillPolygon
Method.Description: Fills a polygon defined by its outer path.

Param.Name: path
Param.Description: Sequence of points defining the polygon's shape. The polygon is enclosed by connecting the first and last points of the sequence.

Method.Name: FloodFill
Method.Description: Fills uniform area matching a simple arithmetic condition (all tiles matching the condition reachable from the starting point through tiles matching the condition are filled with value).

Param.Name: start_x
Param.Description: X coordinate of the starting point.

Param.Name: start_y
Param.Description: Y coordinate of the starting point.

Param.Name: fill_value
Param.Description: The value the matching area is filled with.

Param.Name: mode
Param.Description: Arithmetic operator to be used in the condition.

Method.Name: FloodSelect
Method.Description: Replaces all values in an uniform area matching a simple arithmetic condition with 1 (all tiles matching the condition reachable from the starting point through tiles matching the condition are filled with 1). All other areas are filled with 0.

Param.Name: start_x
Param.Description: X coordinate of the starting point.

Param.Name: start_y
Param.Description: Y coordinate of the starting point.

Param.Name: mode
Param.Description: Arithmetic operator to be used in the condition.

Method.Name: GetMaxValueOnPath
Method.Description: Returns the highest value found in tiles touching a path.

Param.Name: path
Param.Description: Sequence of points defining the path.

Method.Name: GetMinValueOnPath
Method.Description: Returns the lowest value found in tiles touching a path.

Param.Name: path
Param.Description: Sequence of points defining the path.

Method.Name: ExpandDirection
Method.Description: Fills all areas within a distance in one direction from any value greater than 0 with 1. The rest of the map will be filled with 0.

Method.Name: ShrinkDirection
Method.Description: Fills all areas within a distance (in maximum metric) from any negative value with 0. The rest of the map will be filled with 1.

Method.Name: Expand
Method.Description: Fills all areas within a distance (in maximum metric) from any value greater than 0 with 1. The rest of the map will be filled with 0.

Method.Name: Shrink
Method.Description: Fills all areas within a distance (in maximum metric) from any negative value with 0. The rest of the map will be filled with 1.

Method.Name: Outline
Method.Description: Draws a border (made of value 1) around an area matching a condition. The non-border areas are filled with 0.

Method.Name: ConvexityMap
Method.Description: Replaces values in the array with information about steepness of slope (change in value) in that particular value.

Param.Name: radius
Param.Description: Convexity measurement radius (how big a terrain feature must be to show on the convexity map).

Method.Name: Distort
Method.Description: Applies a turbulence distortion filter on the height map.

Method.Name: NormalMap
Method.Description: Replaces all values with values representing horizontal angle of surface normal in the tile. Angle 0� (eastern slope) is represented by value 0, angles in range (0�, 180�) are represented by negative values in range (GGEN_MIN_HEIGHT, 0) and angles in range (180�, 360�) are represented by positive values in range (0, GGEN_MAX_HEIGHT).

Method.Name: GGen_Data_1D
Method.Description: Creates new GGen_Data_1D object of given length.

Method.Name: Clone
Method.Description: Creates a 1:1 copy of the current object.

Method.Name: GetLength
Method.Description: Returns length of the array.

Method.Name: SetValue
Method.Description: Sets value in one tile.

Method.Name: SetValueInRange
Method.Description: Sets value in all tiles in range (bounds are included).

Method.Name: GetValue
Method.Description: Returns one value from the array.

Method.Name: GetValueInterpolated
Method.Description: Return one value from the array interpolated to a different array length.

Method.Name: Add
Method.Description: Adds an integer to all values in the array.

Param.Name: value
Param.Description: Value to be added to values in the array.

Method.Name: AddArray
Method.Description: Adds another array to the current array.

Param.Name: addend
Param.Description: Array to be added. This array will be scaled to match the original array.

Method.Name: AddTo
Method.Description: Adds another array to the current array. Its coordinates will be shifted by an offset.

Param.Name: addend
Param.Description: Array to be added. This array will NOT be scaled to match the original array.

Param.Name: offset
Param.Description: Coordinates of the addend will be shifted by this value.

Method.Name: Multiply
Method.Description: Multiplies each value in the array by a real number.

Param.Name: factor
Param.Description: Real number to multiply all values in the array.

Method.Name: MultiplyArray
Method.Description: Multiplies each value in the array by a corresponding value from factor.

Param.Name: factor
Param.Description: Array to be multiplied by. This array will be scaled to match the original array.

Method.Name: Invert
Method.Description: Flips sign of all values in the array.

Method.Name: Scale
Method.Description: Scales length of the array by a real number.

Param.Name: scale_values
Param.Description: Multiply the values by the ratio as well?

Method.Name: ScaleTo
Method.Description: Scales length of the array to new length.

Param.Name: scale_values
Param.Description: Scale the valuess correspondingly as well?

Method.Name: ScaleValuesTo
Method.Description: Scales values in the array to fit a new value range.

Method.Name: Fill
Method.Description: Sets all values in the array.

Method.Name: ResizeCanvas
Method.Description: Crops or expands the array without changing its values.

Param.Name: new_zero
Param.Description: Coordinate of new origin relative to the original zero.

Method.Name: Clamp
Method.Description: Clamps all values to range.

Method.Name: Flip
Method.Description: Flips order of values in the array, so the first value is the last.

Method.Name: Min
Method.Description: Returns the minimum of all values in the array.

Method.Name: Max
Method.Description: Returns the maximum of all values in the array.

Method.Name: Union
Method.Description: Performs a set union of the array graphs (higher of two respective values is applied).

Param.Name: victim
Param.Description: The union array. This array will be scaled to match the original array.

Method.Name: Intersection
Method.Description: Performs a set intersection of the array graphs (higher of two respective values is applied).

Param.Name: victim
Param.Description: The intersection array. This array will be scaled to match the original array.

Method.Name: Abs
Method.Description: Replaces each value with its absolute value (removes all negative signs).

Method.Name: Monochrome
Method.Description: Replaces each value with 0 if it is less than equal than the threshold or 1 otherwise.

Param.Name: threshold
Param.Description: Values above threshold will be 1, otherwise 0.

Method.Name: Normalize
Method.Description: Makes sure that there are no slopes steeper than 45� in the array. Steeper slopes will be dealt with according to mode.

Method.Name: SlopeMap
Method.Description: Replaces values in the array with information about steepness of slope (change in value) in that particular value.

Method.Name: Gradient
Method.Description: Creates a smooth gradient between two coords. The values will make transition between two values.

Param.Name: fill_outside
Param.Description: Should the values outside gradient interval be filled as well?

Method.Name: Noise
Method.Description: Fills the array with random perlin noise (http://freespace.virgin.net/hugo.elias/models/m_perlin.htm).

Param.Name: min_feature_size
Param.Description: Minimum wave length for amplitude to be used.

Param.Name: max_feature_size
Param.Description: Maximum wave length for amplitude to be used.

Method.Name: Smooth
Method.Description: Smooths differences between values in the array. Uses linear smoothing algorithm.

Method.Name: Flood
Method.Description: Changes the values so given percentage of values is higher than 0.

Param.Name: land_amount
Param.Description: The percentage of values to be higher than 0. 0 means no "land", 1.0 means no "water".

Method.Name: ToPath
Method.Description: Creates a GGen_Path object from current object.

Param.Name: point_count
Param.Description: Number of points in the newly created path object.

Method.Name: GGen_Amplitudes
Method.Description: Creates a new GGen_Amplitudes object.

Param.Name: max_feature_size
Param.Description: The object will have space for amplitudes for wave lengths up to this number.

Method.Name: AddAmplitude
Method.Description: Adds a new amplitude to the object.

Param.Name: feature_size
Param.Description: Wave length this amplitude will be assigned to.

Method.Name: GGen_Path
Method.Description: Creates a new empty Path object.

Method.Name: AddPoint
Method.Description: Adds a point to the end of the path.

Method.Name: AddPointByCoords
Method.Description: Adds a point to the end of the path.

Param.Name: x
Param.Description: X coordinate of the point to be added.

Param.Name: y
Param.Description: Y coordinate of the point to be added.

Method.Name: RemovePoint
Method.Description: Removes a single point from the path.

Param.Name: index
Param.Description: Index of the point to be removed (starting at 0).

Method.Name: InsertPoint
Method.Description: Inserts a point into specific place in the path.

Param.Name: index
Param.Description: Index of the point, after which the new point is inserted (starting at 0).

Method.Name: InsertPointByCoords
Method.Description: Inserts a point into specific place in the path.

Param.Name: index
Param.Description: Index of the point, after which the new point is inserted (starting at 0).

Param.Name: x
Param.Description: X coordinate of the point to be added.

Param.Name: y
Param.Description: Y coordinate of the point to be added.

Method.Name: GetMaxX
Method.Description: Returns X coordinate of the rightmost point in the path.

Method.Name: GetMaxY
Method.Description: Returns Y coordinate of the bottommost point in the path.

Method.Name: GetAverageX
Method.Description: Returns X coordinate of path's center of mass.

Method.Name: GetCenterX
Method.Description: Returns X coordinate of path's unweighted center.

Method.Name: Clear
Method.Description: Removes all points from the path.

Method.Name: Move
Method.Description: Moves all points in the path by an offset.

Method.Name: Transform
Method.Description: Applies a linear transformation matrix onto the path.

Param.Name: origin_x
Param.Description: X coordinate of the transformation origin.

Param.Name: origin_y
Param.Description: Y coordinate of the transformation origin.

Method.Name: Rotate
Method.Description: Rotates whole path around a point.

Param.Name: origin_x
Param.Description: X coordinate of the point around which is the rotation performed.

Param.Name: origin_y
Param.Description: Y coordinate of the point around which is the rotation performed.

Method.Name: Shear
Method.Description: Shears the path vertically and/or horizontally.

Param.Name: horizontal_shear
Param.Description: Horizontal shear factor (0 means no horizontal shearing).

Param.Name: vertical_shear
Param.Description: Horizontal shear factor (1 means no horizontal shearing).

Method.Name: Flip
Method.Description: Flips the path vertically or horizontally.

Param.Name: direction
Param.Description: Direction along which is the flip performed.

Method.Name: Scale
Method.Description: Scales the path.

Method.Name: GGen_Point
Method.Description: Creates a new point object.

Method.Name: GetX
Method.Description: Returns X coordinate of the point.

Method.Name: GetY
Method.Description: Returns Y coordinate of the point.

Method.Name: SetX
Method.Description: Sets X coordinate of the point.

Method.Name: SetY
Method.Description: Sets Y coordinate of the point.

Method.Name: SetCoords
Method.Description: Sets coordinates of the point.

Method.Name: GGen_InitProgress
Method.Description: Sets the maximum progress value.

Method.Name: GGen_SetProgress
Method.Description: Sets the current progress value.

Method.Name: GGen_IncreaseProgress
Method.Description: Increases the current progress value by 1.

Method.Name: GGen_AddIntArg
Method.Description: Defines a new integral script argument. Can be called only within script header.

Param.Name: step_size
Param.Description: Step size (UI only - represents value change for various up/down arrows or sliders). This setting will not be enforced - user can be allowed to manually type in values between steps.

Method.Name: GGen_AddBoolArg
Method.Description: Defines a new boolean script argument. Can be called only within script header.

Method.Name: GGen_AddEnumArg
Method.Description: Defines a new enumeration script argument. Can be called only within script header.

Param.Name: default_value
Param.Description: Default value (index of default option starting at 0).

Method.Name: GGen_GetArgValue
Method.Description: Returns value of one script argument. Can be called only within script body.

Constant.Name: GGEN_INVALID_HEIGHT
Constant.Description: Value representing invalid tile.

Constant.Name: GGEN_MIN_HEIGHT
Constant.Description: Minimum reachable height.

Constant.Name: GGEN_MAX_HEIGHT
Constant.Description: Maximum reachable height.

Constant.Name: GGEN_ADDITIVE
Constant.Description: Too steep slopes will be neutralized by increasing the values (going from the hill-top).

Constant.Name: GGEN_SUBSTRACTIVE
Constant.Description: Too steep slopes will be neutralized by decreasing the values (going from the bottom).

Constant.Name: GGEN_CYCLE
Constant.Description: Values will be cycled through the boundary (disappearing values will appear on the opposite side).

Constant.Name: GGEN_HORIZONTAL
Constant.Description: The operation will be done along the horizontal (X) axis.

Constant.Name: GGEN_VERTICAL
Constant.Description: The operation will be done along the vertical (Y) axis.

Constant.Name: GGEN_BOOL
Constant.Description: Boolean value (yes/no) represented as integer from 0 to 1.

Constant.Name: GGEN_INT
Constant.Description: Integer in given range.

Constant.Name: GGEN_ENUM
Constant.Description: Enumerated value (exactly one of listed values) represented as integer from 0 to (option count - 1).

Constant.Name: GGEN_RIDGES
Constant.Description: The resulting noise will have appearance of an array of crystals.

Constant.Name: GGEN_BUBBLES
Constant.Description: The resulting noise will have appearance of negative of an array of spherical bubbles.

Constant.Name: GGEN_EQUAL_TO
Constant.Description: Compared value is equal to threshold value.

Constant.Name: GGEN_NOT_EQUAL_TO
Constant.Description: Compared value is not equal to threshold value.

Constant.Name: GGEN_LESS_THAN
Constant.Description: Compared value is less than threshold value.

Constant.Name: GGEN_GREATER_THAN
Constant.Description: Compared value is greater than threshold value.

Constant.Name: GGEN_LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO
Constant.Description: Compared value is less than or equal to threshold value.

Constant.Name: GGEN_GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO
Constant.Description: Compared value is greater than or equal to threshold value.

Constant.Name: GGEN_INSIDE
Constant.Description: The border line will be just inside the bordered area (the last cells matching the condition while "looking" from inside the bordered area).

Constant.Name: GGEN_OUTSIDE
Constant.Description: The border line will be just outside the bordered area (the first cells not matching the condition while "looking" from inside the bordered area).

Constant.Name: GGEN_NO_SCRIPT
Constant.Description: No script has been inserted yet, no actions but SetScript and setting map constraints are allowed. SetScript will rise the status to SCRIPT_LOADED.

Constant.Name: GGEN_SCRIPT_LOADED
Constant.Description: Script has been successfully loaded, work with map info is now allowed (LoadArgs can be called only now). LoadArgs will rise the status to READY_TO_GENERATE.

Constant.Name: GGEN_READY_TO_GENERATE
Constant.Description: Script is ready to be executed.

Constant.Name: GGEN_LOADING_MAP_INFO
Constant.Description: Map header is being mined for information, no work with map data of any kind is allowed.

Constant.Name: GGEN_GENERATING
Constant.Description: Script is being executed. All script actions but adding new arguments is allowed.
